root.name: Red Baron II
root.description: Red Baron II is the 1997 sequel to the 1990 award winning WWI flight simulator Red Baron. It featured improved graphics and physics. The campaign featured dynamically generated sorties and there was a mission generator to create new customized sorties. The physics engine was quite advanced for its time and g-forces could twist or snap parts off the wooden planes in high-g turns.
